Diagrams

This is of the diagrams API.

Paths

GET Diagrams

Returns all of the diagrams.

Parameters
Name Value
limit (false)
page (false)
search (false)
tags (false)


POST Diagram

Adds a diagram.

Request Body:


GET Diagram

Return and individual diagrams.

Parameters
Name Value
diagram_id (true)


PUT Diagram

Updates a diagram.

Parameters
Name Value
diagram_id (true)
Request Body:


DELETE Diagram

Deltes a diagram.

Parameters
Name Value
diagram_id (true)


GET Diagram Tags

Returns all of the tags for a diagram.

Parameters
Name Value
diagram_id (true)


POST Diagram Tag

Adds a tag for a diagram.

Parameters
Name Value
diagram_id (true)
Request Body:


DELETE Diagram Tag

Deletes a diagram tag.

Parameters
Name Value
diagram_id (true)
tag_id (true)
